mapper.select: select s.id,s.name,s.login_name,s.password,s.phone,s.email,s.is_valid,s.create_date,s.role_id,r.id 'r.id',r.role_name from t_sysuser s left join t_role r on s.role_id = r.id
mapper.insert: insert into t_sysuser (name, login_name, password, phone, email, is_valid, create_date, role_id) values (#{name}, #{loginName}, #{password}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{isValid}, #{createDate}, #{rolePO.id})
